Dialogue: Aw Jeez! Rick,  where are we?
Morty I told you not to play with my portal gun! We are --URRRP!-- inside some stupid computer game!
Stop interact with this house, stupid player! This won't help you finish this game.
The object you are looking for is at the south of the map.
Oh, young samurai! Want to come in and to show me how long your sword is?
Great Job you found the tea pot!
Now Drink the tea and become enlightened
